message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper discusses evaluation methods for Natural Language Processing/Learning, which falls under the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses biases in evaluation methods borrowed from Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and proposes unbiased alternatives. The use of Monte Carlo simulation for empirical evaluation suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the mention of characterizing the relationship between different evaluation measures suggests a potential focus on cybernetics (cs.CY).
